A criminal desperate can narrowly escape being shot at close range. An auto mechanic saddened sees himself before the fight and debts. A young alcoholic really wants out of his miserable situation. Three very different men seek to find hope in an unexpected place: The Conference of Men Wrist organized by Angus Buchan, the man who is in real life rancher whose spiritual transformation inspired great movie FARMER AND GOD. The story of his own journey Angus blends the stories of three men among the thousands of men who traveled to hear his words. Paths intersect and lives will never be the same again portrayed in film and moving based on real events.
